Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Relatively small white light, fast, made no noise.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around July 20th 2003
divs: sighting detailsme and my buddy were just sitting parked in a cul-de-sac in my car (smoking a joint) when what i thought was a helicopter came down and hovered about 200 feet above and a little in front of and to the left side of my car, but it wasn't a helicopter because it wasn't making any noise. it was rather small. maybe the size of an suv. i couldn't see a shape, just a white spotlight. after staring at it for 2-3 minutes or so it just started moving away (that's the best i can describe it's motion) in the sky smoothly but at an impossible rate of speed without making a sound. and that was it. we were both perplexed. i think it probably lingered with me more than him. i'm pretty sure it was secret military technology mainly due to its size. no race of beings travels the cosmos in a craft that small, unless there was\is a mothership somewhere close by.
